title: Mild chicken korma
ingredients: ['2 large onions', '1/2 to 1 teaspoon oil', '1 garlic clove, minced', '1 teaspoon dried ginger', '1 teaspoon tumeric', '1 tablespoon coriander', '1 teaspoon cumin', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '300 to 450ml water', '3 chicken breast fillets', '3 to 4 tablespoons korma paste', '3 tablespoons light double cream']
